'''''Locus'' 149''' is an issue of the American science fiction and fantasy magazine ''[[Wikipedia:Locus (magazine)|Locus]]''. Issue #149 includes: [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] obituary; Tolkien tributes by [[Wikipedia:Lester del Rey|Lester del Rey]], [[L. Sprague de Camp]], [[Wikipedia:Sterling E. Lanier|Sterling E. Lanier]], [[Wikipedia:Fritz Leiber|Fritz Leiber]], [[Wikipedia:Frederik Pohl|Frederik Pohl]], and [[Wikipedia:Roger Zelazny|Roger Zelazny]].<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.worthpoint.com/worthopedia/locus-1968-149-vg-218543922|articlename=Locus #149|dated=|website=[http://www.worthpoint.com/ WorthPoint.com]|accessed=9 July 2012}}</ref>

L. Sprague de Camp briefly describes his [[Index:Reminiscences of J.R.R. Tolkien|meeting]] with Tolkien, and Sterling Lanier mentions his correspondence with Tolkien (consisting of a "dozen or so" [[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"|letters]]).<ref>{{webcite|author=[[John D. Rateliff]]|articleurl=http://sacnoths.blogspot.se/2012/07/new-arrivals-2nd-of-2.html|articlename=The New Arrivals (2nd of 2)|dated=8 July 2012|website=[http://sacnoths.blogspot.com/ Sacnoth's Scriptorium]|accessed=9 July 2012}}</ref>
